title: 6.15 is unplayable cause the ping
body: Ever since 6.15 came out my ping has random jumps all the times something above 800 ping when I click play everything is fine but once I get into a game my internet bars just drop down 2 instead of three and this doesn't happen unless I play league and my brother plays at the same time as me and it doesn't happen to him PLS HELP ME FIX THIS.

replies.body: Random lag spikes like this can result from a weak connection or packet loss, and cause you to have input delays.  Run a [log reader ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)to get an overview of what's going wrong.  The results will also yield a series of instructions to help resolve your specific issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!
